posts.post_title: wtb wanted T210 series 4 point pleasant cards
posts.post_content: Im looking to buy cards from t210 series 4 especially point pleasant/gallipolis.  There are 10 of the point pleasant cards.
if you find any you don't want Shaf, I'll take them too!
